items.summary: Add a new landing-page section that communicates the projectâ€™s planned token listings after the presale, using English user-facing text and matching the existing neon/glow visual style.
Make the new listings section react to presale state: when the presale is still active, show a clear "not yet" message; when the presale has ended, show the actual listings content.

Integrate the listings section into the existing page flow by rendering it in App.tsx as a new section below the current Tokenomics/FAQ section and above the Footer, without altering existing section behavior.

Define the listings content as a small, editable data structure (e.g., a typed constant list) so future exchange/listing items can be updated without rewriting JSX, and render it as cards with a status indicator (e.g., Planned / In Progress / Announced).
